sim.simobject

Class ObjectInSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.simobject.ObjectInSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GUIObject, SimObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Planet, Rocket, Star, Sun

    public abstract class ObjectInSpace
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimObject, GUIObject
    Author:
    russell, AJ This is an abstract class that contains all the information needed for each object in space Every object, like planets, suns, and others inherit from this class.
